dropletBlock_addItemsToScene_description: Add new items to the scene.
dropletBlock_addItemsToScene_param0_desc: The type of items to be added ('item_walk_item1', 'item_walk_item2', 'item_walk_item3', or ''item_walk_item4'.

dropletBlock_changeScore_description: Tilføj eller fjern et point til scoren.
dropletBlock_changeScore_param0_descript: The value to add to the score (negative values will reduce the score).
dropletBlock_moveEast_description: Moves the character to the east.
dropletBlock_moveNorth_description: Moves the character to the north.
dropletBlock_moveSouth_description: Moves the character to the south.
dropletBlock_moveWest_description: Moves the character to the west.

dropletBlock_setBackground_param0_descri: The name of the background theme ('background1', 'background2', or 'background3').
dropletBlock_setItemActivity_description: Sets the activity mode for a set of items.
dropletBlock_setItemActivity_param0_desc: The type of items to be changed ('item_walk_item1', 'item_walk_item2', 'item_walk_item3', or ''item_walk_item4'.

dropletBlock_setItemSpeed_description: Sets the speed for a set of items.
dropletBlock_setItemSpeed_param0_descrip: The type of items to be changed ('item_walk_item1', 'item_walk_item2', 'item_walk_item3', or ''item_walk_item4'.

dropletBlock_setSprite_param0_descriptio: The index (starting at 0) indicating which actor should change.

dropletBlock_setWalls_description: Changes the walls in the scene.
dropletBlock_setWalls_param0_description: The name of the wall set ('border', 'maze', 'maze2', 'default', or 'hidden').

dropletBlock_whenTouchWall_description: This function executes when the character touches any wall.

dropletBlock_whenUp_description: This function executes when the up button is pressed.

nextLevel: Tillykke! Du har fuldført denne opgave.
numBlocksNeeded: Denne opgave kan løses med %1 blokke.
onEventTooltip: Eksekvér kode som svar på den specificerede hændelse.

reinfFeedbackMsg: Du kan trykke "Fortsæt med at spille"-knappen for at gå tilbage til at spille din historie.

waitParamsTooltip: Venter i et specificeret antal sekunder eller benyt nul for at vente indtil næste klik.

whenDownTooltip: Udfører handlingen herunder når der trykkes pil ned.
